document.full_text: the london stock exchange will find itself in a tight spot trying to fend off a rival bid for canada's tmx group, a deal it badly needs to rejuvenate its centuries-year old business.
document.title: maple's rival bid for tmx puts lse in tight spot
lines_and_colors: the london stock exchange will find itself in a tight spot trying to fend off a rival bid for canada's tmx group, a deal it badly needs to rejuvenate its centuries-year old business.
